todos.title: Learn and apply the HTTP - POST request AND how it relates to React and Redux extraReducer functions
todos.text: Review the HTTP-POST documentation and its syntax in javascript format. Also the react components and redux extraReducer syntax and logic. Apply the acquired knowledge

todos.title: Learn and apply the HTTP - DELETE request AND how it relates to React and Redux extraReducer functions
todos.text: Review the HTTP-DELETE documentation and its syntax in javascript format. Also the react components and redux extraReducer syntax and logic. Apply the acquired knowledge

todos.title: Learn and apply the HTTP - PATCH request AND how it relates to React and Redux extraReducer functions
todos.text: Review the HTTP-PATCH documentation and its syntax in javascript format. Also the react components and redux extraReducer syntax and logic. Apply the acquired knowledge

todos.title: Modify the format of the state UI
todos.text: Format the state (pending, in progress, done ) UI. Green for Done, Orange for in progress, Blue fors pending

todos.title: Read the Individual Project 5 - Project: To-Do List
todos.text: Read and understand each step. Review the required knowledgde needed particularly on HTTP request and REDUX

todos.title: Inspect the pre-made repository
todos.text: Read and explore the pre-written code in the repository
